Package services

Class Service

java.lang.Object
services.Service
Direct Known Subclasses:
AppointmentService, AuthenticationService, ContactService, CustomerService, LocationService
public abstract class Service extends Object
Base class for Services that interact with the database. This class provides methods for mapping a result set returned from a database call into an internal application type.
